Messages.ConnectError: Can not connect to UPS. COM port device does not exist.
Messages.ReciveError: Reply timed out from COM port UPS device.
Messages.ZeroUsePower: No device assigned as power monitor.
Messages.PowerAndModbus: Two devices assigned as power monitor, only Modbus RTU in use.
Messages.BadBatteryState: Uninterruptible Power Supply is broken. Contact service engineers.
Messages.UdpHeartbeatWarning: Connection to external periphery device is unstable.
Messages.UdpHeartbeatError: Connection to external play button have been lost.
Messages.BadUdpSettings: Invalid IP address or port of external periphery device or computer.
